page.title: 15KEMPSTON INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The estate used to be called the {Chantry Road Estate}but was{renamed the{Woburn Road Estate}as the area has been expanded and developed with the opening of the Kempston bypass, allowing better access to the area.The newer part of the estate is made up of both small and large factory units. As many of the{workforce live outside the {area}many factories have a carpark on the premises. Some of the factories {make goods from raw materials,}others {assemble parts}which arrive from elsewhere and some are used as {warehouses.}The newer factories have landscaped their surroundings. The {products made on the estate}vary from communication cables, etching materials, micro-chip electronic tills, industrial models, to the old type of industry like ball_bearings and welding equipment.
